snippet: Health officials say the patient, whose identity was not revealed, and three others received organ transplants from the same donor.
abstract: Patient in Maryland dies of rabies contracted from kidney transplant, and three other people who received organs from same donor are being treated to prevent the disease.
lead_paragraph: Health officials say the patient, whose identity was not revealed, and three others received organ transplants from the same donor.

headline.seo: Rabies Killed Maryland Kidney Transplant Patient
headline.main: Maryland Transplant Patient Dies of Rabies
headline.print_headline: Maryland Transplant Patient Dies of Rabies

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
